meanings.definition: Shared by all members of a community
meanings.sent1: The playground was a communally enjoyed space for all the children in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The communally owned garden provided fresh produce for everyone in the village.
meanings.sent3: The communally baked cookies disappeared in seconds at the community picnic.
meanings.sent4: The communally built shelter stood strong against the storm, protecting the entire village.
meanings.sent5: The communally tended fire warmed the hearts of all who gathered around it.

meanings.definition: In a communal manner or way
meanings.sent1: The villagers worked communally to repair the bridge after the flood.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends decided to live communally in a shared house.
meanings.sent3: The animals in the zoo communally greeted the visitors with loud roars and chirps.
meanings.sent4: The students communally cheered for their team during the championship game.
meanings.sent5: The neighbors communally organized a street cleanup to beautify their area.
